website_summaries.verdict: The ideal choice for customers needing a shorter arm cast cover at a cheaper price.
pros: Made with heavy-duty vinyl for supreme protection and durability
Waterproof and leak-proof materials work exceedingly well
cons: Can be a little painful to take on and off injured arm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and then store when you're done. Got this for my mom who had surgery on her arm. This covered the bandages so they didn't get wet in the shower. She was able to get it on and off by herself vs. using a plastic bag and tape method which is a big hassle. Glad we found this product and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Zonchick

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Cast Dry, The Easy Way.
customer_reviews.text: This cast cover works really well, keeping water off of my cast in the shower. Make even a weak fist with the hurt arm. Pull the cover on over the cast. Shower and dry. Make a fist again gripping the cast with your finger as you pull it off. You should be able to do it with little or no help. Made with durable materials.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Shuttleworth

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cast dry!!!
customer_reviews.text: You will keep your cast dry! First cast after surgery was too bulky and it didnt fit great (but did the job). I am now in long arm cast for next 3 months and so happy i have this! If your going to be in cast for anytime this is worth every penny :)
customer_reviews.author: mojo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, was sent the wrong body part!!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! Would have loved to use it... But the box said "arm Cast Cover"... in the box was a leg cast cover...oops. I'm sending it back and ordering another...hopefully will get the arm.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy D.

customer_reviews.title: Sure beats a bag and a rubber band!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised with the effectiveness of this product. Now I can shower and float in my pool with no leakage. The company produces a quality product that is very durable and useful. I'm very satisfied with this solution.
customer_reviews.author: don in riverdale

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is really an awesome product! I had a bad fall a few weeks back. Broke my right wrist, left elbow and nose. Prior to using this product, we were spending quite a bit of time doing the trash bag wrapping of 2 arms before a shower. Made it a really tiring and tedious job (for me and my husband) of taking a shower. This product made this task easier. The bands around your arms ...they are really tight, but I am guessing this is to make sure your arms stay dry. Which they did! Definitely need help putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: N. Raukko

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I had a picc line for 14 weeks. At first I was using plastic wrap and taping the edges. The tape always made my arm sticky afterwards. This cover made showering so much easier. My bandage never got wet, stayed completely dry. Would work great with casts too. I was so happy I purchased this sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Momma❤️Deals

customer_reviews.title: Cast Cover
customer_reviews.text: If you have a broken arm and they put it in a hard cast then you NEED this item. I went swimming in the Ocean then swimming in the pool and then take a shower and not "!" drop of water or pebble of sand gets inside this cast cover. This is the best product ever made. I am a nurse and advise and sometimes by this for my patients to cover their PICC LINES, Mid-Lines, wounds on arms that must be kept dry, then this is your product. High quality plastic, high quality rubber that lets you slip your arm in then a slight tug seals the cast cover closed. Genius !!!!!!!!!! 10 Stars Dina, Boston,MA
customer_reviews.author: DINA

customer_reviews.title: Keep the entire cast dry
customer_reviews.text: This cast protector did exactly as it said it would do. It keeps the entire cast dry during a shower. The plastic is heavy duty, so I don't worry about it ripping. My only complaint is that the opening is very tight on my upper arm. I am storing it between uses with a large plastic Tylenol bottle inserted through the opening and that has seemed to loosen it up a bit. It is also very long for a short arm cast, but long is better than short. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Lepsch

customer_reviews.title: Not for a soft cast or area with pain
customer_reviews.text: I had wrist surgery. Great idea, except if you have a soft cast with any amount of wrapping or any pain you won't be able to get this over the injured area without possibly inflicting more pain. Took it out of box, husband looked at it and said No way! Didn't return it by the date, so I have one that will go to waste. They were quick in delivering the item.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo Barb

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Cast Dry and easy to use !! Well made !
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my wrist & firearm cast dry!!! Was able to use it without help after 4-5 times. It fit very snug initially and I needed assistance to get it on and off, but now I can quickly cover my cast and keep it dry! It is very tight on my upper arm, but my arms are large and it’s designed to prevent water from getting inside to the cast, so, well with the cost! We probably spent more than the cost of the cover using s new trash bag and tape every day!
customer_reviews.author: Constance S. Dewhirst

customer_reviews.title: Arm Circulation Problems
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery the week before he Fourth and thought “this is perfect for the lake!” Only to find out it was causing more problems than helping my one. It caused my hand to hurt more by cutting off the circulation in my whole arm! This sucks. It’s too tight which means I guess it will keep the water out... if you don’t want feeling in your arm. My plastic bags did more and was a lot more comfortable than this
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Countryman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your cast dry!
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly how it was supposed to. Fit well over my cast. I probably could have used the shorter one. My only complaint is that it was tight to the point of discomfort. In order to keep the water out, the rubber gasket is stiff and the hole very small. It stretches so I could get my hand and arm through. Plenty of room for the cast. But it left a mark and I showered quickly. It felt like I was wearing a tourniquet.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea OKeefe

customer_reviews.title: Tight seal
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve is plenty long and it does a great job of keeping water out. I had to have help getting it on and off because it hurt my arm to try to pull the sleeve cap over a cast or sling if someone wasn’t helping hold the cap open. The cap is very tight. I have small arms but I would think it would be uncomfortable for many adults. Cutting slits would help but a person would have to do it carefully to not compromise the seal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schramm

customer_reviews.title: Extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It was so tight, felt like my arm was going to fall off due to lack of blood circulation. Couldn’t even keep it on for 3min nevermind a whole shower. Just did plastic grocery bags secured with painter’s tape. Perhaps not as stylish, but did keep cast dry without pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water Tight.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year-old son needed surgery, a plate with six screws, to fix his broken radial bone. He was placed in a huge splint. We needed a way to be sure we could keep the area dry during baths. This product worked very well. The rubber seal was extremely tight, which made it difficult to slide over the huge splint, but once on, it kept out all the water nicely.
customer_reviews.author: MoonFaeree

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom after she broke her wrist. It was easy to use once we got the hang of it. It does squeeze your arm at the opening but that makes it watertight. Totally with the cost and way easier than Walmart bags and duct tape. Would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but hard to get on.
customer_reviews.text: The cover is built very sturdily andhas kept water out for several years has so far. The biggest downside is that I can’t get it on by myself. It’s super tight. My husband has to help me put this oneach time I take a shower.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another one similar to this one and am very satisfied with both of them. They work perfectly to keep any water from seeping in. I've never had a need for these products but having had hand surgery scheduled I knew I needed protective covers. These work great and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: HighHopes

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased his for after my arm surgery. I tell my patients they should get one to shower with. NOT any more. I pulled this up on my tiny arm, I only weigh 105 pounds. It immediately was so tight my hand turned purple. There is no way this is good or circulation. Im sure itll keep arm dry but after you wear it for 10 minutes you may need another surgery for lack of blood flow to arm and hand. Not a good idea. Just use plastic bags instead.
customer_reviews.author: Beebee

customer_reviews.title: No water gets through if you use it correctly but it sure squeezed the crap out of my arm
customer_reviews.text: This thing does it's job. The plastic covering is very study and certainly won't rip. It is sturdier that the picture shows. No water gets through if you use it correctly but it sure squeezed the crap out of my arm. The diameter of the hole at the top is about two inches. It's rubber so it stretches but it's still awful tight. I take short showers so it wasn't a huge problem for me but I imagine someone with a much larger arm might have a problem. For reference I'm a 5 foot 3 inch woman who has little to no bicep.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Totally waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I have a fractured wrist and this item is so much better than the taped baggies.it truly is waterproof I use it in the shower, hot tub and swimming and is very reasonably priced. Hope you don,t need one ,but if you do this is a good one
customer_reviews.author: k skis

customer_reviews.title: Worked great protecting my husband’s picc line following surgery
customer_reviews.text: Worked great protecting my husband’s picc line following surgery. Allowed him to shower and not worry about getting his infusion area wet. Very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: jshea3

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Forget plastic bags and tape. This cover completely protects your bandage or cast. No leaking. Such a relief to be able to shower without worrying about your bandage getting wet. Much easier if you have someone to help you get it on and off. We also bought the leg cover several years ago and it worked well, too. No help needed with the leg cover because you have both hands to work with.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful price and excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for! My dad had recently had a tumor removed from his arm and it was difficult for him to shower and keep his arm dry. This was truly an awesome find and Everything from the cheap price to the quick delivery was fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany H.

customer_reviews.title: Hole in top too tight
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to use this cast cover after my thumb surgery. There was no way I could push my hand through the tight hole. I live alone so no one could stretch it open for me and it was too small and tight for my purpose. Back to the plastic bags! It's well made, I just couldn't make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Line Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Producy
customer_reviews.text: This was my second arm surgery and this time I decided to try the cast coverz product and I could not be happier. This product worked flawlessly even after 6 weeks of on and off twice a day over a very poorly applied rough textured cast. Should I ever have another cast, there is no doubt in my mind that I would choose the cast covers product again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Worked very nicely over multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Worked very nicely and kept area dry. For a thumb joint surgery, it was a little hard getting the opening over the thumb but just work with it and it's fine. Kept area dry and that was the point. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Posting some thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! I had surgery for a trapezium restructuring of my dominant thumb and will be in a cast for 6 weeks. This cast cover allows me to shower, wash dishes, do laundry, etc without getting the cast wet or soiled . I thought it was large when I first opened it, but it allows me quite a bit of flexibility with the portion of my fingers that are out of the cast .I would recommend this product highly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not one size fits all
customer_reviews.text: The product idea is a good one. The cast cover is not intended for anyone with muscles. The waterproof seal was too tight. To "slip" the cast cover over the arm with the cast was very difficult and caused pain. I'm not sure what to do with the cast cover now.. might research the possibility on returning the item. It did not suit our needs at all. This cast cover is not designed for athletes, at least muscular ones.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: It is far better than the Seal Tight Freedom Cast and Bandage Protector ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised to protect my full arm cast. It is far better than the Seal Tight Freedom Cast and Bandage Protector which started to leak after just 19 days. Much easier to put on over the cast too.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeper

customer_reviews.title: Fits very Tight
customer_reviews.text: Had surgery on my hand and really needed this. Will be in a cast for the next 18 weeks. While it did protect and keep dry it was extremely tight around my arm. It was very uncomfortable. I will say though Max was great and I loved that he cared for my input. I really appreciated him reaching back out to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Keeps his cast and arm dry!
customer_reviews.text: This has been so helpful! Purchased for my 13 yr old who broke his arm. One of us was having to help him wrap his arm with a trash bag and with this he's able to do it on his own. Keeps his cast and arm dry!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Flores

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is secure and strong and I am quite confident using it in the shower. It is nice and tight at the top yet I don't feel like I have a tourniquet on. I am getting a smaller cast next week, so will order the half arm cast cover for that time, just in time for my trip to Antartica! I will have the best dressed cast, and all will feel confident they won't have to baby me because of keeping it dry.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia A Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for showering!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter broke her arm and has a huge cast from fingers to upper arm. I was so scared to get it wet in the shower and this is the perfect solution. You really have to pull the rubber open at the top to get her arm and cast through but if it weren't so tight it wouldn't do its job to keep the water out. Once this is on she can get in the shower and do whatever she wants, her arm is completely protected. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Engle

customer_reviews.title: Durable and reusable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to prevent casts from getting wet. It is reusable and durable. The only downfall is it is one sure fits all so it was on the long side for me at 5.2 ft. The other downside is that putting it over a cast requires two hands to open the seal so it does require assistance. So all in all great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product works great, there is no water getting into it. However, it is uncomfortably tight on heavy people arms. I have to speed through my shower so I can get it off. I realize it has to be tight for the seal to keep water out, but it is like a tourniquet.
customer_reviews.author: Jlwood

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it would have been great!
customer_reviews.text: The rubber seal that keeps the water out is too tight for my arm. Otherwise it would have been great!
customer_reviews.author: Bluebluesdancer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and had it sent to my 88-year-old mother who had broken her wrist. She called me yesterday to tell me how wonderful this product was and told me I got an “A” for the day. Did I mention she used to be a teacher ?!
customer_reviews.author: heidi pearson

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: My mom has sarcoma tumors on her forearm which have to be bandaged and cannot get wet. She tells me the product works well without leaks but is much too long for her arm. Instructions say it can be applied by the user but mom says it takes two hands and much strength to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Baragona

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection for cast in shower!
customer_reviews.text: I had major reconstructive surgery on my thumb joint to have it removed and bones pinned. Cast was dry after my shower. Easy to put on and take off, while just using one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Soweski

customer_reviews.title: No way in the fragile state I'm in this will ...
customer_reviews.text: No way in the fragile state I'm in this will go over my brace without pain. Also took over a month to arrive. Something to consider in a time sensitive purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pulley

customer_reviews.title: Great product- stay dry
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfied. Product arrived on time. I went swimming with it on ( small pool for fun) submerged and not a drop got in. Good for showers too. Not easy to get on but not too hard either. Has to be tight so I understand. Received emails from seller wanting to make sure I was happy so I’m sure good customer service if any problems were to arise.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Tight seal around bandages for a Dry shower!
customer_reviews.text: Tight seal to get in the shower without getting your bandages wet! Highly recommended!! I’ve tried several other kinds, this one is the BEST!!
customer_reviews.author: TamTam

customer_reviews.title: This Item is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've broken a bone so having items that I need such as the cast cover for bathing is totally necessary! I love it but pray that I never have to use it again! It's absolutely necessary to have this for showering!
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Water tight!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My arm stays totally dry and I can take a shower and wash my hair without worrying about my arm getting wet. It's tight enough that it does take help getting it on - one hand doesn't do it with a splint and bandage. It's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jonnalyn K Grover

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product, works great, no leakage. I wish they made a shorter one. This one could go up to the middle of my upper arm. I do only pull it up to my mid forearm as that is all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a life-saver! I was able to take showers after my carpal tunnel procedures with ease and no worries about my hand getting wet - it works perfectly! I brought the package in to my orthopedic doctor's office to share the info with them and future patients. I love this product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: P.T.

customer_reviews.title: This was a must for my son’s casted arm!
customer_reviews.text: This works AMAZINGLY great! We bought it for my son who broke his arm and he was able to swim, take showers, etc and it kept water out extremely well!!!!! Would definitely recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J T Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good for small arms
customer_reviews.text: If you have a big arm this isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My son broke his wrist so we needed something to protect his cast when he takes a shower. The ring around the top of the sleeve makes it extremely easy to pull on and off. He is 15 and gave me a demonstration of just how easy it is 😂. Hopefully we won’t need to use it again after he is healed but I’ll be packing it away just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Regeina

customer_reviews.title: Keep it dry
customer_reviews.text: Got fast shipping on the arm cast cover. Used it a couple of times. It goes on good. Snug at upper arm. No leaks, cast stayed dry in showers. Durable, good for several uses. Reasonably priced. Good buy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: AZretired1

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great ! It keeps the cast dry I had no problems with the sellers they are wonderful for reaching out to me to see if I had any problems with this product which there was not
customer_reviews.author: tana fierro

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely water tight!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, completely waterproof. Mitten design for hand allows you to wash your hair. Is easy to take off without assistance depending on injury, you may need help getting it over your cast or appliance. Is comfortable. A definite step up from doubled garbage bags. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Regina M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great. The only thing I had to do was to make tiny slits in the elastic gasket to get it over the cast the first time. After that, it is a complete water seal. Well worth the money and the peace of mind when taking shower that I won’t get the cast wet.
customer_reviews.author: Ann R.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly, kept my cast dry
customer_reviews.text: Needed to have wrist surgery and had to wear a cast for six weeks. This cast cover is super easy to use and kept my cast completely dry. Hopefully I will never need to use it again but just incase I’ll keep it since it is in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Heyama

customer_reviews.title: No leaking
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic product. I had carpal tunnel surgery & was unable to get in the pool. I bought the sleeve & was able to get in the pool . My only complaint is it was so tight even around my wrist, but definitely no leaking. If there is a hole size choice remember it runs a little small
customer_reviews.author: donna coates

customer_reviews.title: Works great and keeps cast dry
customer_reviews.text: This product is much easier to use than trash bags and tape. I bought this for my teenage son. The product fits tightly on his arm and works well to keep water out. I don't know how well it would work on someone with large arms though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great idea but just too tight around the arm
customer_reviews.text: great idea but just too tight around the arm....I bought the one that goes over the elbow & up the upper arm---it is tight; keeps the water out even in the swimming pool, I love that one, but this shorter one cut off my circulation completely & I don;t even have alarge arm, quite the contrary.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Robnett

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and no worries about moisture affecting your cast
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the cast cover. The seal was a nice fit without being to tight and I didn’t have any problems with moisture affecting my cast. It was easy on and off with only one hand. I now can relax and feel totally comfortable taking a relaxing shower with no worries of my cast getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Used this product every night to take shower and worked like a champ
customer_reviews.text: 14 year old son had an arm cast from wrist to above elbow for 3 weeks. Used this product every night to take shower and worked like a champ. Cast never got wet, cover still going strong. Fully satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jeff Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: kind of like a tight blood pressure cuff
customer_reviews.text: This product is all it is advertised to be. I recently broke my wrist and have a cast over my elbow. The cast cover keeps my arm dry so I can shower without worry. I am an older person and the seal is a little tight on my upper arm, kind of like a tight blood pressure cuff, and I am hoping it will stretch out a little more so it is not as uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa T Carley

customer_reviews.title: Tight as Tournique
customer_reviews.text: I cannot perceive anyone using this unless it is a small child. I purchased for my husband (bandage to shoulder) but I could not even get it to my upper arm without cutting off blood circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Showering
customer_reviews.text: can be a little snug if your arms a a bit big. Overall works well for taking shower without getting your cast wet.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Cantonwine

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Snug fit that definitely keeps my cast dry. You do need help putting it on (at least I do)
customer_reviews.author: Tim T.

customer_reviews.title: Use after surgery
customer_reviews.text: Had Carpal Tunnel surgery and worked great when having to keep hand dry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my husbands arm after having surgery. Great way to shower without getting his brace wet.
customer_reviews.author: DJamie

customer_reviews.title: broken arm at wrist
customer_reviews.text: Received fast! because mt arm is broken at the wrist, I could not get all mt fingers and hand through hole. Too much pain so I cut the hole a little larger and will use but it won't be the best seal.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing! Super duper tight almost too tight but that's ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Super duper tight almost too tight but that's kinda the point. I've only showered with this in my arm but I have 0 doubts you could swim with this without getting your cast wet. I'm a very small person with a very small arm and it still worked . 👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Review not related using the product. Product had
customer_reviews.text: Was not able to use this product, but it does look like it would work well. Removable cast was put on so no longer needed. It’s a shame the company doesn’t offer free returns for unused product.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it should!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping a cast dry, and this was over $10+ cheaper than buying from a local store as I price shopped prior to! The ones that are in the stores for near this price are cheaply made, this one is very heavy duty for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Burford

customer_reviews.title: The product is a great product however I am not able to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is a great product however I am not able to use it yet because the plastic band puts pressure on a tendon they cut during my surgery. Once that tendon heals this product is going to come in useful keeping my cast dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof... so jump into your shower with confidence
customer_reviews.text: Great protection and totally waterproof when you need to be in a cast for 8 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: The cast cover has worked great and has done the job I needed it to ...
customer_reviews.text: The cast cover has worked great and has done the job I needed it to do. Shipping was fast; I would definitely order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Small entryway
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect if you’re trying to protect a Band-Aid on your finger. Couldn’t get my wrist cast thru the small hole. Pretty sure I injured my wrist more just by trying.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly and did the job no water passed through. covered the whole arm on my friends teenage son. Had bought one from Walgreens and it was too short even though it said full arm
customer_reviews.author: annamae408

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot since I can be able to swim without getting wet
customer_reviews.author: Truc

customer_reviews.title: Moisture inside after first use
customer_reviews.text: My husband used during a shower for the first time today and there was moisture in the sleeve when it was taken off. He is 260lbs and it was tight on him. Using to cover a picc line during showering.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Keniston

customer_reviews.title: This is a great, innovative product that really works
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, innovative product that really works! It's really difficult to tape a plastic bag to my arm. This product makes showering and sitting in my jacuzzi so much easier! I even recommened to someone getting a cast on at the Dr office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: the opening was to small, we had to cut it bigger. The sleeve held up without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old and it fit her perfect and the seal was tight
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Effective as a tourniquet/torture device
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the water out, ok but your lucky if you have an arm after your shower. This thing is SO tight it cuts off your blood supply (I’m a woman, with small arms and I bought the half arm) not to mention, it is SO painful to get your fingers through the little hole with a painful broken wrist. So yeah, it works but it seriously sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Ner7551

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This allowed my son to take showers after breaking his arm. Very good product. Fits very snug at the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Dysfunctional
customer_reviews.text: This was the most dysfunctional item I have ever tried to use!! It tore my ace bandage trying to get it on, finally got it on and had to cut it off!!! Horrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dry without a doubt
customer_reviews.text: I broke my wrist so, of course, have to keep the cast dry. I was a little surprised at how tightly the cover squeezed my arm, but had no doubt it was doing the job and keeping my arm dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kathalin R. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This is too small and it was ordered for my 12 year old.
customer_reviews.author: ruizcc

customer_reviews.title: It’s a really brilliant concept just wish it was shorter
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would of looked more closely to the pictures of the cast cover! I didn’t realize that it would go up to my armpit ! It’s a really brilliant concept just wish it was shorter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... seller reached out to see if I was completely satisfied with my order it turned out I had a ...
customer_reviews.text: The seller reached out to see if I was completely satisfied with my order it turned out I had a question and they were able to answer. The vacuum seal can be too tight but easy to trim to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mihiret

customer_reviews.title: dressing stays dry
customer_reviews.text: The seal seems to be working properly so that my splint does not get wet. Not quite long enough with the bend at the elbow, but it works for the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: cveyrad

customer_reviews.title: Great product for post surgical wound care!!
customer_reviews.text: This worked beautifully after I had carpal tunnel surgery. I was able take a shower without getting my bandages wet. Easy to use and durable. I’ll be able to reuse it for the other hand when I have that one done.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Schuh

customer_reviews.title: Great price and it works!! ☺
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a huge help to this mother for my 10 year old who broke her wrist!! She was able to go swimming and it is great for the shower!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: It does get condensate in the bag .
customer_reviews.text: It does get condensate in the bag . So wipe it inside as well as out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Batres

customer_reviews.title: Seam opened in 1 month
customer_reviews.text: II bought this product in July it is now August and the seam is opening. I would like to return it window closed for returns 7/31.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Beers

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Like ot but I had to cut the top piece so my circulation wasn't cut off but I have big arms. Allowed me to enjoy the waterpark with my husband. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BrittneyG

customer_reviews.title: Water tight fit. A little snug fit my arm ...
customer_reviews.text: Water tight fit. A little snug fit my arm but it did what it was designed to do, keep the water out.
customer_reviews.author: D Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent delivery and excellent product. I have used it several times and it has given me flexibility in the shower and has kept my arm dry.
customer_reviews.author: Phil H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as advertised. Used it when I had cast on wrist and it provided excellent waterproofing while showering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design & Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This full arm cast cover is GREAT! Fantastic design and easy to use by yourself. Very effective in keeping the cast dry. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t approve it, to hard to get through the cast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super great product
customer_reviews.text: Super great product! I ordered the half arm & it was pretty long but worked amazing for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkig0227

product_meta.title: Adult Arm Cast Cover with Waterproof Seal Protection. Keep Casts & Bandages Totally Dry for Shower, Bathing Or Swimming. Heavy Duty Vinyl is Durable Yet Lightweight and Reusable. (Adult Full Arm)
product_meta.description:
Size:Adult Full Arm

Buy Today With Confidence Knowing That Our Adult Arm Shower Cast Cover Comes With A Lifetime Guarantee and Money Back Guarantee!


We Offer An Iron-Clad 3 Tier 100% Money Back Guarantee:

1. If your not 100% happy with it, ship it back and we will refund your money.
2. If you don't love it, ship it back and we will refund your money.
3. If the product breaks or is damaged, ship it back and we will replace it for FREE.

Here is the bottom line....there is absolutely no risk for you to purchase our Adult Arm Shower Cast Cover 

Buy Now with confidence knowing that 1000's of others have been completely satisfied with their results because of our 100% money back 3 tier customer satisfaction guarantee.

***Bonus*** All orders come with a PDF instructional guide and 90% off coupon for your next Amazon order.
feature_bullets: NO LEAK GUARANTEE: Keep your cast or bandage safe, dry and waterproof while still being able to shower, swim or bath because we guarantee that your pediatric cast shower cover won't leak. You can continue your daily routines without the hassle of trying to shower or bath and not get your cast wet.
HEAVY DUTY VINYL: Our heavy duty vinyl is latex free and will keep your cast and bandages protected and is built to last a lifetime without leaking or allowing any moisture in.

ONE SIZE FITS ALL: One size will fit either right or left arm and will fit all adults. Keep your shower cast cover around for future use, whether male or female this arm cast will fit any adult easily.
SWIM, SHOWER OR BATH WITH CONFIDENCE: Easy grip rubber diaphram ring allows you to pull the cast protector on with one hand. Heavy duty rubber won't tear or leak.

LIFETIME GUARANTEE: Don't worry about the leg cast protector ever leaking, breaking or being damaged, we offer a lifetime guarantee. If anything ever happens, just let us know, we will replace it for free. Order with confidence! Comes with our NO-QUESTIONS-ASKED 100% SATISFACTION MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE
